script.line: Uhh....
10 cubic hectares?
...Uh oh.
Uh oh indeed. That's not right at all.
11 cubic hectares? Wait, no. Thirty sandwiches.
I'm gonna get it. Just give me a second. I think it's-- Minty!
No. Through context clues, I assume Minty is the name of your dog.
Sorry, yeah, I know. I mean-- I mean where is she?
She booked it out that door before I could get her.
Oh no! We gotta find her!
Prota, I'm not sure you're in the state to do anything.
No, no. I'm fine. I was just confused for a second.
Okay...well... you know Minty best. Where would she run if she got off the leash?
Hmm... The beach! The grocery store?
No. Doc Sandwich! Wait-- maybe the skate park.
Professor Marbels, do you mind if I take Prota to--
Yes, yes. Go. I need to focus on fixing the Marbelizer.
And I don't need that dog coming back.
I'm really sorry we--
Think nothing of it, Besto. Science is an imperfect art.
And also, I would like to not be sued by either of your families.
Rest assured your internships are safe with me.
And in the meantime... I'll get to fixing the Marbelizer.
Maybe she's on the moon. She loves the moon.
Let's go, Prota.
